actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal building located at 80 North Hughey Avenue, in Orlando, Florida, as the "George C. Young United States Courthouse and Federal Building".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building located at 80 North Hughey Avenue in Orlando, Florida, as the George C. Young United States Courthouse and Federal Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal building located at 80 North Hughey Avenue, in Orlando, Florida, as the "George C. Young United States Courthouse and Federal Building".
